Title: Daemon Plague Toads of Nurgle
Legend: Plague Toads are mutated, pseudo-amphibian sacs of brackish filth and pus, whose wide maws can swallow a man whole. They are drawn to places of disease and decay, and in such places they can be summoned by those loyal to the Plague Father.
Intro: BATTALIONSThis warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Leaping Pox

Rules.Rule: DESCRIPTIONEach model in a Daemon Plague Toads of Nurgle unit is armed with a Grasping Tongue and Yawning Maw.

Rules.Name: Bloated Flesh
Rules.Fluff: Most weapons simply slide harmlessly through the bloated, abscess-riddled flesh of a Daemon Plague Toad with little effect, the foul bulk of the thing swallowing up blades and arrows harmlessly.
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES This unit has a ward of 5+.

Rules.Name: Rot-Eaters
Rules.Fluff: A Daemon Plague Toad’s jag-toothed maw yawns impossibly wide as the abomination prepares to devour its victim.
Rules.Rule: Rot-eaters: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with this unit’s Yawning Maws is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound roll and save roll for each hit.
